00045 void Vec3Zero(Vec3* Result)
00046 {
00047         Result->x = 0.0f;
00048         Result->y = 0.0f;
00049         Result->z = 0.0f;
00050 }

00071 {
00072         Result->x = x;
00073         Result->y = y;
00074         Result->z = z;

00089 void Vec3Negate(Vec3* Result, Vec3* Operand)
00090 {
00091         Result->x = -Operand->x;
00092         Result->y = -Operand->y;
00093         Result->z = -Operand->z;
00094 }

00111 void Vec3Add(Vec3* Result, Vec3* Operand1, Vec3* Operand2)
00112 {
00113         Result->x = Operand1->x + Operand2->x;
00114         Result->y = Operand1->y + Operand2->y;
00115         Result->z = Operand1->z + Operand2->z;
00116 }

00133 void Vec3Subtract(Vec3* Result, Vec3* Operand1, Vec3* Operand2)
00134 {
00135         Result->x = Operand1->x - Operand2->x;
00136         Result->y = Operand1->y - Operand2->y;
00137         Result->z = Operand1->z - Operand2->z;
00138 }

00151 /*************************************************************************/
00152 void Vec3Normalize(Vec3* Result, Vec3* Operand)
00153 {
00154         float length = Vec3Length(Operand);
00155 
00156         Result->x = Operand->x / length;
00157         Result->y = Operand->y / length;
00158         Result->z = Operand->z / length;
00159 }

00177 {
00178         Result->x = Operand->x * Scalar;
00179         Result->y = Operand->y * Scalar;
00180         Result->z = Operand->z * Scalar;
00181 }

00183 /*************************************************************************/
00197 /*************************************************************************/
00198 void Vec3Project(Vec3* Result, Vec3* Operand1, Vec3* Operand2)
00199 {
00200         float scalar;
00201 
00202         scalar = Vec3DotProduct(Operand1, Operand2) / Vec3DotProduct(Operand2, Operand2);
00203 
00204         Vec3Scale(Result, Operand2, scalar);
00205 }

00207 /*************************************************************************/
00218 /*************************************************************************/
00219 float Vec3Length(Vec3* Operand)
00220 {
00221         return sqrt(Vec3SquareLength(Operand));
00222 }
00223 
00224 /*************************************************************************/
00235 /*************************************************************************/
00236 float Vec3SquareLength(Vec3* Operand)
00237 {
00238         return (Operand->x * Operand->x) + (Operand->y * Operand->y) + (Operand->z * Operand->z);
00239 }

00244 /*************************************************************************/
00258 /*************************************************************************/
00259 float Vec3DotProduct(Vec3* Operand1, Vec3* Operand2)
00260 {
00261         return (Operand1->x * Operand2->x) + (Operand1->y * Operand2->y) + (Operand1->z * Operand2->z);
00262 }
00263 
00264 /*************************************************************************/
00275 /*************************************************************************/
00276 float Vec3CrossProductMag(Vec3* Operand1, Vec3* Operand2)
00277 {
00278         float i, j, k;
00279         
00280         i = (Operand1->y * Operand2->z - Operand1->z * Operand2->y);
00281         j = -(Operand1->x * Operand2->z - Operand1->z * Operand2->x);
00282         k = (Operand1->x * Operand2->y - Operand1->y * Operand2->x);
00283 
00284         return sqrt(i * i + j * j + k * k);
00285 }
